name: Unidentified_stormtrooper_(Anya_Karu)
content: A Human Imperial stormtrooper served on the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Anya Karu under Captain Aron Harcourt prior to 3 BBY. The stormtrooper most likely perished when the Anya Karu was sabotaged by Rebel agents, causing it to crash on a distant planet. The Bounty hunter Boba Fett encountered and shot the corpse of the stormtrooper when he searched the remains of the Anya Karu in 0 ABY after Harcourt, who had survived the crash, requested a holorecording left on the warship of his departed wife Janelle Harcourt.
